original_text: When the officials of Judah heard about these things, they went up from the royal palace to the house of the Lord and took their places at the entrance of the New Gate of the Lord’s house.
korean_text: 유다의 고관들이 이 말을 듣고 왕궁에서 여호와의 성전으로 올라가 여호와의 성전 새 대문의 입구에 앉으매

sentences.original_text: When the officials of Judah heard about these things
sentences.korean_translation: 유다의 관리들이 이 일들을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: they went up from the royal palace
to the house of the Lord
at the entrance of the New Gate of the Lord's house
